TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapIgnoreAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指示 不序列化公共字段或公共读/写属性值。

span.span: Instructs the not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类属于一系列属性，这些属性控制 如何将对象序列化或反序列化为编码的 SOAP XML。The class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML. 生成的 XML 符合万维网联合会文档（[简单对象访问协议（SOAP）1.1）](https://www.w3.org/TR/2000/NOTE-SOAP-20000508/)的第5部分。The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium document, [Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/2000/NOTE-SOAP-20000508/). 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅[控制编码的 SOAP 序列化的属性](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md). 若要将对象序列化为编码的 SOAP 消息，必须使用通过 类的 方法创建的 构造 。To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the using an created with the method of the class. 在序列化类的实例时，将 应用到希望 忽略的任何类成员。Apply the to any class member that you want the to ignore when an instance of the class is serialized. 例如，当成员用于包含有关要序列化的对象的元数据时，可以执行此操作。For example, you may do this when the member is used to contain metadata about the object being serialized. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以在代码中使用 word `SoapIgnore` 而不是更长的 。You can use the word `SoapIgnore` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例将名为 `Group`的类进行序列化。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 重写 `GroupName` 和 `IgnoreThis` 字段的序列化和 `GroupType` 枚举的成员。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在 `CreateOverrideSerializer` 方法中，将创建一个 ，并为每个被重写的成员或枚举创建一个 ，并将其添加到 中。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用 创建 ， 用于创建重写默认序列化的 。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将名为 `Group`的类进行序列化。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 重写 `GroupName` 和 `IgnoreThis` 字段的序列化和 `GroupType` 枚举的成员。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在 `CreateOverrideSerializer` 方法中，将创建一个 ，并为每个被重写的成员或枚举创建一个 ，并将其添加到 中。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用 创建 ， 用于创建重写默认序列化的 。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]
